title: Susan Wokoma • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #116
itunes:title: Susan Wokoma • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #116
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful actor, writer and comic SUSAN WOKOMA!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the wonderful actor, writer and comic SUSAN WOKOMA!


A proper fun time with Susan right here, as she and Brett get into the whole existential mess one film at a time. Listen to them get into a whole ton of mad tangents including a very solid premise for a reality show (I won’t even spoil it by mentioning the name - it’s brilliant), her involvement in the writer’s room on Sex Education, her Sky short ‘Love The Sinner’ which sounds amazing, being a bit psychic, thoughts on Capricorns, sleep paralysis, Nollywood, Abba pilgrimages, and her acting world! So much goodness and good times, you’ll love it. Please enjoy SUSAN WOKOMA!
